p: Of the four trials which continued recruitment during COVID-19, the primary driver in 3/4 (75%) of trials was potential participant benefit of treatment and participant safety 1/4 (25%). Concerning the factors influencing the decision to continue recruitment with modified procedures, a single trial identified participant benefit of the treatment, and one identified the risk associated with treatment withdrawal as influencing the decision. In 3/4 (75%) trials, funding was a factor.Â
